title: California Firm Recalls Ground Beef Due to Possible E.Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct 11, 2011 - Commercial Meat Co., a Los Angeles, Calif., establishment is recalling approximately 377,775 pounds of ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The following...
impacted_products: 5,10,15,20,30,40,50 and 60 lb. cases of bulk ground beef
